pages.text: Letting a full block of $(l:magical_blocks/liquid_crystal)Liquid Crystal$() absorb the immense heat of $(item)Lava$() resulted in this.$(br)Almost feels like a $(item)Magma Block$(), albeit way hotter.

pages.title: Incandescent Essence
pages.text: Crushing Blazing Crystal with an $(item)Anvil$(), you get this burning hot essence that almost sets your hand on fire when you touch it. Crushing $(item)Magma Blocks$() seems to work, too, albeit with far less yield.

As $(item)Water$() tried to touch a full block of $(l:magical_blocks/liquid_crystal)Liquid Crystal$(), the crystal turned solid.$(br)Since even a light touch is enough to give you a cold shiver, you called it Frostbite Crystal.

pages.title: Frostbite Essence
pages.text: Crushing $(item)Frostbite Crystal$() with an $(item)Anvil$() gave you this ice cold essence, which almost makes your hand freeze just by holding it. Crushing $(item)Ice$() seems to work, too, albeit with far less yield.
